body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle HCM Cloud. The links and information that you requested are below:
  • Learn more about HCM Cloud - here
  • Gartner, Magic Quadrant for Cloud HCM Suites for Midmarket and Large Enterprises - here
  • Human Capital Management Cloud Using Analytics and Reports Whitepaper - here
  • Listen how Annika Lindholm, Global HR Owner, Skanska, a leading construction group, discusses how they leveraged the power of HCM Cloud - here
  • Listen to Oracle SVP, HCM Product Marketing, Emily He discuss the biggest focus areas for HR in the year ahead YouTube - here

Thank you,
Oracle team
